idea-plugin.name: Emberly
idea-plugin.description:
About

Emberly is a dark theme collection inspired by the warm amber tones of the Rust Book documentation theme. It provides a comfortable, eye-friendly environment designed for extended coding sessions.

If you enjoy themes like Ayu or Tomorrow, you might like Emberly.

Themes

  • Emberly Carbon - Balanced dark theme with dimmed tones
  • Emberly Noir - Classic dark theme
  • Emberly Umbra - High contrast for maximum clarity

Installation

After installing, go to Settings → Appearance → Theme and select an Emberly theme.

Font

Optimized for Source Code Pro (size 14, line height 1.2). Falls back to JetBrains Mono if not installed.
